meanings.definition: A type of noodle soup originating from Japan.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious bowl of ramens for lunch.
meanings.sent2: In Japan, many people love to eat ramens during the winter.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the hot ramens on his apron!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a pot of boiling ramens.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the steaming ramens filled the entire kitchen.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'ramen', referring to multiple servings of the dish.
meanings.sent1: We ordered three ramens for our dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers discounts for large orders of ramens.
meanings.sent3: The kids slurped their ramens noisily, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the savory scent of multiple ramens.
meanings.sent5: The table was crowded with colorful bowls of delicious ramens.
